# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Dyna3D_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Dyna3D)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
Dyna3DPluginInfo.C
Dyna3DCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
Dyna3DPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
Dyna3DMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtDyna3DFileFormat.C
Dyna3DFile.cpp
MaterialProperties.cpp
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
Dyna3DEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtDyna3DFileFormat.C
Dyna3DFile.cpp
MaterialProperties.cpp
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DVISIT_DYNA)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IDyna3DDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IDyna3DDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IDyna3DDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MDyna3DDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MDyna3DDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MDyna3DDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MDyna3DDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EDyna3DDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EDyna3DDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EDyna3DDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EDyna3DDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EDyna3DDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EDyna3DDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EDyna3DDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EDyna3DDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Dyna3D ${INSTALLTARGETS})
